ygData.subject: Re: bronze weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: Is a Runed Totem Staff a 2H weapon?  What is the going price of these or where can I get one? I use a Great Worn Staff right now and it s a 2H weapon. I
ygData.messageBody:
Is a Runed Totem Staff a 2H weapon? What is the going price of these or
where can I get one? I use a Great Worn Staff right now and it's a 2H
weapon. I thought about 1H because I could then use something in my
other hand (Clay totem +5HP, etc.)

What does everyone else think is better ... 1H or 2H .. and what
specific weapon is best for an Ehchanter?

Release the hounds .... the messages anyway


-----Original Message-----
From: Miller, Keith A. [mailto:keithm@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 3:44 PM
To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: bronze weapons


From: "Miller, Keith A." <keithm@...>

Nah, runed totem staff is the way to go. I think its +5HP, +5 mana, and
hits like a mino axe (although its a little slower).

BTW, I play on Bristlebain

-----Original Message-----
From: Magik [mailto:aarongb@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 2:36 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: bronze weapons


From: "Magik" <aarongb@...>

NO!!!......and if youd REALLY like a good weapon to use as a
staff......go
get a Fine Steel Staff.....I have one and they are WONDERFUL!!!!......



Neurosiz
